EmailTemplate.textOnly: - - - 90 Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE Gray - After speaking with other members of your team at Hogan Lovells I’ve heard that you are in the middle of migrating from a Hyper-V environment to a VMware environment, and I was hoping to show you how Turbonomic is the only virtualization control platform that is hypervisor agnostic, allowing teams to manage and optimize a heterogeneous environments like your own, and properly shift workloads from one environment to the other. Our control platform allows teams to: - Reduce ongoing compute/storage costs by 20-30% by optimizing workload placement as they shift workloads to a new hypervisor technology - Reduce operational costs of problem and incident management by eliminating complex problems with disk space and IO performance contention - Assure application performance and reduce risk by minimizing the contention for CPU, Mem, disk space and IO capacity - Enable more IO-intensive applications to be virtualized reliably, bringing down the overall cost to deliver compute services to the business and customer We do all of this with no human intervention through our workload automation engine. Do you have 30 minutes for my engineer and I to explain how this is possible on a 30 minute WebEx?
